channel.title: Little Error Need Help :)
channel.description:
Ok, so im hosting my friends RSPS, and he gives me the client.
He has about 10 other people online, and i open the client, run it, and go to login myself.
It says "error connecting to server"
I check the source, and it keeps coming up with this error, over and over.
java.lang.NullPointerException at client.process<client.java:10987> at PlayerHandler.saveGame<PlayerHandler.java:371> at PlayerHandler.process<PlayerHandler.java:308> at process.run<process.java:23> at java.land.Thread.run<Thread.java:619>Does anyone know how to fix that?
Thanks.

item.title: Little Error Need Help :)
item.dc:creator: @XxicemanxX XxicemanxX
item.description:
@XxicemanxX wrote:

Do you have JDK and if so is it updated with your client?

Read full topic

item.title: Little Error Need Help :)

item.description:
@pkinglife317 wrote:

Ok, so im hosting my friends RSPS, and he gives me the client.

He has about 10 other people online, and i open the client, run it, and go to login myself.

It says “error connecting to server”

I check the source, and it keeps coming up with this error, over and over.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.processclient.java:10987
